amendment.description: To end the premium subsidy for any property purchased after the date of enactment of this Act.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4710 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4710 proposed by Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3882-3883; text: CR S3882) To end the premium subsidy for any property purchased after the date of enactment of this Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4710 proposed by Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 4707.
